Articles.Content:
I have a modded install with the SETI mod and all suggestions through CKAN.

If I right click a part in VAB to pop-up the window, then launch the craft without closing the pop-up window, said window will be visible all time, even in the main menu, without possibility of closing it (since there is no close button in the pop-up windows)

I can't reproduce this bug in a stock install, so it's surely made by mods, but can't determine which one.

Has anybody seen this bug before? any workarounds?

Thanks.

Yup, I've had it happen too; I posted on the Facebook closed group, and got replies that others were seeing it too. I'm not using SETI, but almost certainly some of it's suggested other mods.

I've had science windows, and engine property windows stick to the screen - even thru exiting to the main menu.
